entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: SSW 47 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
